name: yBANQ
long_description: We are building a collections and reconciliation platform for MSME's in India. In India, reconciliation is largely manual and error prone due requiring manual matching of bank statements with Invoices. In my last role, I used to head product for PayU, India #1 Fintech firm. I would love to connect with other Fintech founders building solving similar problems and in the neobanking space
one_liner: yBANQ is building a Bill.com for India to simplify collections and…
